PROCEDURE _handlecntcancelsaveevent *------------------------------------------------------- * Project.........: Basis.PJX * Library.........: FormType_v1.vcx * Class.Module....: frmFormTypeEdit._HandleCntCancelSaveEvent * Called by.......: <NA> * Parameters......: <tcMessage> * Returns.........: <none> * Notes...........: <~> *------------------------------------------------------- LPARAMETERS tcMessage

Èçìåíåíèÿ ñîõðàíåíû íå áóäóò.],16,[Îøèáêà...]) .cstDataWork.Restore([lvFrmTypeEdit]) ENDIF ENDIF *------------------------------------------------------------------------------
ELSE

ENDIF *------------------------------------------------------------------------------

IF .cRequestedOperation == [ADD]

CASE .cRequestedOperation == [EDIT] .Caption = .Caption + [ - Ðåäàêòèðîâàíèå] .Icon = FULLPATH([frmedit.ico]) CASE .cRequestedOperation == [INFO] .Caption = .Caption + [ - Ïðîñìîòð] .Icon = FULLPATH([frminfo.ico]) .cntCancelSaveHandled.cmdOk.Enabled = .F. CASE .cRequestedOperation == [DELE] .Caption = .Caption + [ - Óäàëåíèå] .Icon = FULLPATH([frmdele.ico]) .cntCancelSaveHandled.cmdOk.Caption = [Óäàëèòü] ENDCASE *------------------------------------------------------------------------------
